Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) has an electrolyte that is solid and works at a temperature range of 600-1000 degrees C; it can use a wide range of fuels and the relatively high operating temperature makes it possible for internal reforming with high-quality heat by-product for cogeneration.
Titulo: Economics evaluation of a 5 kW SOFC power system for residential use

Sentencas: In this paper, we address quantitatively the problem with reference to a 5 kW SOFC power system for residential use.
Titulo: Economics evaluation of a 5 kW SOFC power system for residential use

Sentencas: The goal of the paper is to provide an analysis of possible scenarios that will make SOFC applications feasible from an economic point of view.
Titulo: Economics evaluation of a 5 kW SOFC power system for residential use

Sentencas: in this respect we provide a sensitivity analysis of some common financial metrics to key input parameters, the improvements in electrical efficiency, changes in regulatory policy and changes in the market energy prices.
Titulo: Economics evaluation of a 5 kW SOFC power system for residential use

Sentencas: The economic feasibility of different scenarios is evaluated and compared resorting to the usual metrics in financial analysis.
Titulo: Economics evaluation of a 5 kW SOFC power system for residential use
